title: A Shelter Is...: A Dog's Journey from Shelter to Home
description: In “A Shelter Is…” young readers will take a journey into an animal shelter through the eyes of an injured yet hopeful pup seeking a forever home. This beautifully illustrated picture book shines a light on the vital role of animal shelters — sanctuaries where hope is kindled, and dreams of a warm, loving home are made possible. Readers will discover the transformative power of care, compassion, and community through one dog’s story of taking its first scared steps into the shelter to a joyful moment of adoption. This story highlights how every animal deserves a chance for happiness and the incredible impact we can have by opening our hearts and homes.This story is more than just a tale of one dog finding its forever home; it’s also a call to action to make the world kinder for our animal friends. Perfect for young animal lovers, this story will inspire a new generation to nurture and advocate for those who bark, purr, and paw their way into our lives.
author: Carolyn Wooddall
